## Bs

bs

**Returns:** string

```ts
faker.company.bs(): string
faker.company.bs() // => "deliver distributed mindshare"
```

bsAdjective

**Returns:** string

```ts
faker.company.bsAdjective(): string
faker.company.bsAdjective() // => "real-time"
```
